duties_responsibilities.duty: Prepares wafers for experimentation, loads wafers, prepares reactor for experimentation, and cleans reactors.
Evaluates performance of process system and records process conditions and experimental observations.
Operates scanning electron microscope (SEM) for cross-section and top view analysis, identifies all patterns of interest, and understands image quality requirement.
Prepares graphs and tables summarizing results and evaluates wafers and thin films.
Orders equipment and supplies, coordinates with vendors and purchasing, and performs routine shut down procedure.
Coordinates instrument repair and maintenance and interfaces with requestors to understand their detailed requirements.
Sets up equipment for experiments and uses quantitative wafer evaluation and process instrumentation knowledge.
